name: Where is my dog, Banny?
description:
It is a game of finding a cute little white dog named "Banny". She has been missing since the morning, and you will be helping the girl who owns Banny to find her dog until the sunset. You will start from the girl's room, and you will get to choose where to go in order to find the dog. 

The hint is: "You should never give up!"
